Player History

Injured on 6/19/2004 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...

Injured on 6/12/2014 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...

Hit first career homerun on 9/19/2018, off Arthur West (SDP)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Cincinnati on 5/31/2020...

Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2020...
